Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'How does one describe the wind?'}
{3: 'That which carries the fallen leaf and that which ripples the water.'}
{3: 'But it might not be the wind that carries the fallen leaf or rippled the water.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory720.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'So this... is the world beyond the Gate.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Gate Keeper looks up into the dancing leaves in front of the giant maple tree.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Have you never been here yourself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "I am the Gate Keeper. What's behind the Gate is not my business.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'I have never turned to look at the Gate behind me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Or maybe... there was no Gate to begin with.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'No, the Gate has always been there.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You are the Gate. You were the one keeping all of this behind the Gate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'I am... the Gate?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'But this tree is not a dream that belongs to me. I am just a fragment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Maybe this dream belongs to the human "you."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'You mean "him"? No, this dream does not belong to "him," either.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: '"He" only wanted to take one last look at Kowloong, at that ship, and at "his" friends.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Were you a passenger on the Nighter?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "Who isn't?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'To find the truth, we died on the Nighter and were born again on the Nighter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'For the same truth, we became the Gate Keeper, or the Gate itself...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Maybe you could tell me your name and the names of your friends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You might not... be able to make it out alive, but I could still say hi to them for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'I could tell them your story.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'Ha, names are not important. I am no longer in that dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Do you know whom this dream belongs to?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "I don't know. All I know is that this tree is the dream of a seed.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'A seed?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hanying searches for the seed but cannot find it.'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'This is a wish.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'A wish that can only be realized in a dream...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "The old man's dream?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "I told you. I don't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'This dream is just a wish. It is not even a real dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: "It's too shattered and incomplete to even have a proper entrance.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'My existence is no longer needed since you have passed through the Gate.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Will you awaken from the dream?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'No, because we are already part of this mountain.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The Gate Keeper picks up a leafâ€”which, a moment later, drifts back down to the water's surface with the breeze."}
{2: 'Gate Keeper', 3: 'These autumn leaves that blanket the heavens mark the end of our journey.', 4: '2'}
